channel.title: devops on The Unhandled Exception Podcast

item.title: Episode 13: DevOps with Dushyant
item.description: In this episode, I was joined by good friend and ex-colleague, Dushyant Priyadarshee to chat about devops! We covered a lot of ground, from what devops is, to infrastructure as code deployments, to exams and certifications! Dushyant is a Senior Platform Engineer at NewDay. Links from the show Dushyant’s links Blog Twitter LinkedIn NewDay (workplace) Other links from the show Terraform Terraform CDK Pulumi Bicep Terratest TFSec Azure DevOps Azure ARM Templates Azure DevOps “name” Twitter Poll GitHub Actions Microsoft Learn Microsoft Exams/Certifications MeasureUp DevTip links Daily Coding Problem The Phoenix Project book The Unicorn Project Notion
